metadata.title: CVE-2016-9139 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Open Ticket Request System(OTRS) 3.3.x before 3.3.16, 4.0.x before 4.0.19, and 5.0.x before 5.0.14allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via acrafted attachment.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
